title: A New England Nun - imagery and figures of speech

content.question: The chief effect of the imagery and figures of speech in the last four sentences of the final paragraph is to

choices.label: establish an attitude of separation and loneliness
create a mood of domestic happiness and convivial society
suggest a rejection of worldly things in favor of a purely spiritual realm
affirm an atmosphere of reclusive peace and tranquility

content.answer: affirm an atmosphere of reclusive peace and tranquility

skill.text: Skill 5.D: Identify and explain the function of an image or imagery.
